author: reshm
title: Crypto regulations in India
description: Comment faire en sorte que les législateurs et les agences concernées soient sensibilisés à l'écosystème Cardano et à sa pertinence pour l'économie informatique.

f6_assessments.q0:
The proposal aims at imposing a legal lobby in India in order to influence crypto regulations and ease the creation of related jobs in the IT-sector. 
As India is holding a significant portion of the world's population and has the potential of onboarding a lot of people in the cryptographic community as a whole, there will be a need for a clear legal framework or risk uncertainty which will put people off. This lobby could be a first step towards creating such a framework.
f6_assessments.q1: The proposers are well known within the Project Catalyst ecosystem and claim relevant experience as legal experts and dispute resolution specialists in the proposal. This would indeed enable them to create a promising legal lobby. The budget has been set modestly, but realistically. This project is planning to reach out to other organisations early on in their roadmap, increasing chances of success.
f6_assessments.q2: Everything has been set in place in the proposal to ensure progress to be tracked if funded. To improve the proposal, some clarity on how and when the project is to be launched is advisable as, to me, this wasn't entirely clear. (I'm assuming Q1 2022?)
f6_assessments.reply: The ratings do not reflect the assessment.

f6_assessments.q0: The proposal is a very good idea. The goal (creating crypto regulations) fits into the challenge settings. I believe that the proposal will be of great relevance to Cardano if implemented
f6_assessments.q1: I agree with the fact that the team has skills and experience needed to implement the proposal. The proposer has provided links to that effect. The budget is well presented. The plan for the proposal is reasonable and detailed to implement. However, the proposer has not included possible risks involved in the implementation of the proposal.
f6_assessments.q2: The proposer has outlined a roadmap for the proposal. However, key milestones and time horizon for the achievement of the proposal are not outlined. Metrics/KPIs that define success are not included. The targeted problem is well described.

f6_assessments.q0:
Great idea. The solution stated in the proposal is to 'Sensitise the stakeholders that Cardano is safe platform, that it works with nation states and that it can create jobs in the IT sector'.

The challenge seek for favourable regulation within the jurisdiction of various countries and have a voice among the political class that can influence for favourable laws for crypto. 

I think the solution is parallel to the challenge and is not clear on how it would help achieve favorable legislation.
f6_assessments.q1: No two ways about the team's experience. The scope of work and road map do not help in achieving favourable legislation. The proposal focuses on promoting Cardano and how it can help create jobs, however, there is no clearly map out activities that would help achieve it. What medium is the proposal considering to engage stakeholders?
f6_assessments.q2: Great budget breakdown. Most part of the budget is going to compensate the team. Since the proposal seeks to do sensitization, I think budgetary allocation should focus on activities that would help achieve great sensitization.

solution: Sensibiliser les parties prenantes au fait que Cardano est une plateforme sûre, qu'elle fonctionne avec les États-nations et qu'elle peut créer des emplois dans le secteur informatique.
experience: L'équipe de Loxe Inc., des ingénieurs logiciels seniors, des pionniers de Plutus, des vétérans de Gimbalabs PPBL, des experts juridiques et des spécialistes de la résolution des conflits.
